## **Loading R packages**

```{r}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
realis.csv <- read_csv("data/realis2019.csv",show_col_types = FALSE)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = realis.csv,
       aes(x = `Unit Price ($ psm)`)) + 
  geom_histogram()
```
